<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Numb to Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=6494) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 232 <sup>1.1</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) For the purposes of Society play, remove the Prerequisites of Numb to Death that states “you have died at least once.''_

**Prerequisites**
[Diehard](/Feats.aspx?ID=5140); you have died at least once

</column>

---

Your past has left you numb to death's call. The first time each day that you regain Hit Points while you are [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=69), you gain a circumstance bonus to the number of Hit Points you regain equal to your level, and you neither gain the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=99) condition nor increase the value of this condition.
name: Numb to Death
prerequisite: Diehard; you have died at least once
prerequisite_markdown: [Diehard](/Feats.aspx?ID=5140); you have died at least once
